original_text: And in the vine were three branches: and it was as though it budded, and her blossoms shot forth; and the clusters thereof brought forth ripe grapes:
korean_text: 그 나무에 세 가지가 있고 싹이 나서 꽃이 피고 포도송이가 익었고

sentences.original_text: And in the vine were three branches:
and it was as though it budded,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 마치 새싹이 돋아난 것 같았고

sentences.original_text: and the clusters thereof brought forth ripe grapes:
